code: import axios from"axios";class BooksApi{constructor(){this.url=void 0;this.api=void 0;this.url='https://www.googleapis.com/books/v1/volumes';this.api=axios.create({baseURL:this.url});}async getBooks(){let query=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:"harry potter";const response=await this.api.get(`?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}`);return response.data.items;}}export default BooksApi;
